desc: She Follows Floral Design is a wedding and events floral designer with a sophisticated and edgy flair. Based in Goulburn we offer a range of floral services across the Southern Highlands, South Coast, Canberra and Goulburn regions. We create beautiful flowers for weddings or events, as well as, our weekly florals.

layout.text: Making memorable moments just a little more magical!

We love, love and we don’t care who knows it! From your initial consultation we carefully take your ideas and match them with our expertise. We source florals that will melt your heart and bring extra magic to that special day.
